label: Apple iPhone 13
description: The latest iPhone 13 with A15 Bionic chip, 128GB storage, and 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display. Available in multiple colors.

label: Dell XPS 13
description: Dell XPS 13 with Intel i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. Ultra-thin design, perfect for on-the-go productivity.

label: Sony WH-1000XM4
description: Sony's industry-leading noise-cancelling headphones with up to 30 hours of battery life, touch sensor controls, and voice assistant compatibility.

label: Herschel Little America Backpack
description: Herschel's iconic backpack with a classic mountaineering style, featuring a spacious main compartment, padded laptop sleeve, and adjustable drawstring closure.

label: The Catcher in the Rye by J.D. Salinger
description: A classic novel originally published in 1951, following the story of Holden Caulfield, a teenager navigating life in New York City.
